 * Direct Gaze: Seated on industrial diamond-plate steps, bathed in soft, diffused blue-hour light.
 * Cinematic Profile: Pensive on concrete stairs with dramatic shadows and sharp highlights from a nearby neon sign.
 * Ethereal Lean: Against a white mesh fence, looking upward as warm bokeh from paper lanterns melts into the background.
 * Relaxed Recline: Lying back on wooden stairs, hands behind head, with prismatic lights leak from the upper edge frame.
Styling & Lighting:
She wears a white jersey tee under blue denim overal. The lighting is incredibly rich, featuring complex light play: prismatic lens flares, soft halation around crimson lanterns, and a moody chiaroscuro that highlights textures of concrete and steel.
Technical Aesthetic:
Shot on 35mm film ({argument name="film stock" default="Portra 400"} feel), the color grading is a sophisticated blend of desaturated teals and warm, nostalgic yellows. The images feature a fine, organic film grain, a gentle soft-focus bloom, and a deep, atmospheric "art house" richness. The atmosphere is electric yet intimate, blending the lively festival energy with quiet, soulful introspection.

content:
Shot on Hasselblad X2D with 80mm lens, hyperrealistic printed photobook page of a Eurasian model, aged 20s, in an outdoor editorial setting.

LAYOUT: Hero + Multi-angle sidebar - Asymmetric editorial layout.

BOOK FORMAT & IMAGE PLACEMENT:
Open photobook spread viewed from a slight angled perspective, resting on a polished stone surface. Semi-gloss paper with visible grain, realistic ink reflection. Four-frame photobooth-style photo sequence in a precise 2×2 grid with thin black dividers.

HERO SECTION - STRICT INTERACTIVE FOUR-POSE SEQUENCE:
Top-left frame: Right cheek resting on right hand. Soft smile. Left hand loosely holding a {argument name="accessory" default="silk scarf"}. Head slightly turned to the right, eyes looking toward the top-right frame.

Top-right frame: Wearing the scarf as a head wrap. Right hand adjusting. One eye closed in a playful wink. Head slightly angled downward, eyes looking down toward the bottom-right frame.

Bottom-right frame: Holding the scarf near the chin. Subtle pout. Head slightly turned to the left, eyes looking toward the bottom-left frame.

Bottom-left frame: Scarf removed. Left arm lifted behind the head. Upper body turned slightly. Head lifted upward, eyes looking above the camera.

TONE: Tone-on-tone palette of creamy whites, soft beiges, and hints of sage green, quiet luxury aesthetic.

LIGHTING:
Soft, even studio lighting with natural skin tones and subtle shadows.

STYLE:
Quiet luxury editorial, natural movement, high fashion photography, old money aesthetic.

STYLE KEYWORDS:
Cream, light linen, natural light, subtle glam.

TYPOGRAPHY & DETAILS:
Minimal small text near the bottom of the page. Clean, understated sans-serif typography, with a tiny QR-style printed detail.

Negative prompt: illustration, doll, toy, stylization, CGI look, lens flare, chromatic aberration, JPEG artifacts.. A stylish handwritten signature Willy is elegantly and small letters placed at the Bottom Right corner

content:
A cinematic winter travel moment set at a quiet Alpine mountain station just after snowfall. A young man stands near the edge of a snow-dusted platform, wearing a matte black puffer jacket over a neutral sweater, dark jeans, and winter boots. His posture is relaxed, hands in pockets, breath faintly visible in the cold air, with a calm, confident expression and natural, realistic skin texture.

Beside him, {argument name="animated character 1" default="Nick Wilde from Zootopia"} leans against a metal railing, hands casually folded, wearing his signature green shirt and striped tie, giving a knowing side-smirk as if mid-conversation. A few steps away, {argument name="animated character 2" default="Judy Hopps"} stands atop a snow-covered luggage crate, adjusting her blue police uniform with an upbeat, alert expression, ears slightly raised.

In the background, towering snow-covered Alpine peaks fade into soft atmospheric haze. A red mountain train slowly departs the station, leaving subtle motion blur and a sense of journey. Cold winter daylight, soft diffused light reflecting off the snow, realistic shadows grounded in the environment. Ultra-detailed textures, crisp winter air, cinematic depth of field. Photorealistic human seamlessly blended with high-quality animated characters. Travel-film aesthetic, emotionally warm yet minimal, high resolution, 4:5 aspect ratio.

content:
Use the uploaded image strictly as the identity reference. Preserve the same person, exact facial structure, hairstyle, age, gender, body proportions, and overall likeness. Do not add or remove any person. Do not change identity. Transform the subject into a messy, fun, scribbly doodle-style illustration.

Doodle Illustration Style:
Create a hand-drawn doodle with uneven, rough, and exaggerated line art. The lines should be loose, wobbly, and erratic, like a child’s excited scribble. Outlines should be thick, broken, and inconsistent. The drawing style must look rushed, spontaneous, and energetic. Use visible pencil or crayon strokes that add to the untidy, chaotic feel.

Color & Texture:
Use bright, pastel, and vivid colors in a flat, playful way. The color should be filled in without careful detail, mimicking a rough, sketchbook feel. The colors must look uneven and imperfect, almost like they’ve been scribbled on quickly. Add some watercolor textures, but keep them playful and imperfect, as if someone has used a wet brush for a quick, vibrant fill.

Facial Features:
Draw simple, exaggerated, childish features. Dot eyes, tiny squiggly smiles, and tiny noses. Keep the features rough and uneven, adding to the playful, messy doodle effect. Expressions should be lively and fun, filled with joy.

Proportions & Form:
Slightly exaggerated proportions with a large head, simplified limbs, and soft, rounded body shapes. The anatomy should look very stylized and unrealistic. Add extra randomness to proportions, with some body parts bigger or smaller than usual.

Shading & Lighting:
No realistic shading. Use rough pencil strokes for shading or simple color blobs. The lighting should be minimal, keeping the whole image bright and flat without depth.

Mood & Atmosphere:
Fun, quirky, and full of energy. The vibe should be carefree and spontaneous, like a doodle drawn in the middle of a storybook or a school notebook. Keep the emotional tone playful and full of life.

Background:
The background should be a mix of simple, scribbly shapes, soft doodle marks, and abstract forms like squiggles, hearts, stars, or random lines. Keep the background as loose and unrefined as the subject.

Rendering Rules:
No photorealism, no photo texture, no cinematic lighting, no digital painting. The illustration should look like a true, chaotic, scribbly doodle. Avoid sharp or clean edges, avoid detailed realism. The lines and colors must be rough and spontaneous.

Final Output:
A lively, fun, and messy scribbly doodle-style illustration using crayon or colored pencil, with rough, energetic lines and flat pastel colors, preserving the exact identity from the uploaded image in a playful, carefree doodle style.
title: Scribbly Doodle Illustration Style Prompt

content:
A young Chinese woman in her late teens to early twenties, looking back over her left shoulder with her body slightly turned away, gazing directly and intensely at the camera with a slightly melancholic, contemplative expression. 

She wears a loose, light-colored down jacket or coat ({argument name="coat color" default="soft tones such as off-white, light gray, beige, cream"}), layered over a dark turtleneck sweater or black hoodie, with a loosely draped black scarf around her neck — classic dark inner + light outer winter layering style.

Her hair is deep brown to black, styled in a slightly messy low bun or low ponytail, wind-swept with several loose strands naturally falling beside her face, giving a natural, slightly disheveled feeling.

Fair, delicate, smooth skin with soft natural texture. Refined Korean-style makeup: subtle gradient eyeliner, gentle aegyo-sal (under-eye highlight), glossy lips. Large, expressive brown eyes slightly narrowed, looking straight at the viewer with depth and emotion. Neat straight bangs resting on her forehead, soft straight eyebrows, overall soft and gentle facial features.

She carries a black backpack with clearly visible shoulder straps.

Location: {argument name="location" default="Nanjing Road pedestrian street in Shanghai"}, bustling commercial district, at dusk or right after rain in overcast, damp weather.

Background: heavily blurred crowds of people, dense rows of Chinese neon signs and illuminated billboards on both sides, distant silhouette of the Oriental Pearl Tower visible in the background. Wet, reflective ground with puddles. Strong colorful reflections of neon lights, street lamps, traffic lights, and car tail lights in the water. Blurred reflections of signs, buildings, and the Oriental Pearl Tower in the puddles. Overhead wires and decorative lights, rich bokeh light spots created by traffic lights and car headlights.

Lighting: soft diffused cinematic light with slight grain feeling, overall cool blue-cyan ambient tone from overcast sky, contrasted by warm yellow, red, orange, pink-purple neon light spots reflected on wet surfaces — high contrast in background reflections, low contrast soft lighting on her face.

Camera: medium close-up portrait, eye-level angle, extremely sharp focus on eyes and face, shot on Hasselblad XCD 3,4/75P (equivalent to ~50mm), creamy beautiful bokeh, rich light spots and reflection details preserved in background.

Style: cinematic, emotional, urban life slice-of-life mood, street photography + emotional portrait, classic {argument name="color grading" default="teal-orange complementary color grading"}, overall cool low-saturation tones with warm neon highlights, soft dreamy atmosphere. Vibe: nostalgic, lonely, melancholic yet romant

content:
A hyper-realistic, candid medium shot of a young woman kneeling in a vast, snow-covered field, affectionately hugging a grey and white Siberian Husky. The woman is in her early 20s with long, straight dirty-blonde hair framing her face. She has a fair complexion with a natural rosy flush on her cheeks from the biting cold, and she is smiling gently, looking down at the dog with genuine warmth. She is wearing a massive, textured brownish-beige faux fur Ushanka hat that is heavily dusted with fresh snowflakes. Her body is bundled in a thick, jet-black faux fur coat, creating a strong contrast against the white environment. Her hands are visible, wrapping tightly around the dog's thick neck.

The Siberian Husky sits upright and stoic, enduring the hug with a calm demeanor. The dog has intense, crystal-clear ice-blue eyes looking straight ahead. Its fur is thick and detailed, with individual clumps of snow resting on its head, ears, and wet black nose. The texture of the dog's coat is coarse and realistic, distinct from the woman's softer hat and glossy black coat.

The background is a soft, out-of-focus rural winter landscape under a heavy, overcast white sky. Faint outlines of grey farmhouses, a low wall, and bare trees are visible in the distance through the fog. The lighting is flat and diffuse, characteristic of a cloudy winter day, casting no harsh shadows. Large, real white snowflakes are actively falling throughout the scene, adding depth and blurring slightly in the foreground and background to create a raw, cinematic atmosphere. High fidelity, 8k resolution, raw photography style.

content:
A low-quality smartphone selfie taken during a chaotic Christmas after-party inside a messy house. A smiling man in the foreground holds the phone at arm’s length, wearing oversized {argument name="glasses shape" default="star-shaped"} party glasses, his face slightly distorted by the wide selfie lens. He looks cheerful and a little drunk, with an unfiltered, carefree expression.

Behind him, the living room is in complete disarray. One person lies on the floor holding a bottle, wearing a crooked Christmas hat. Another person is slumped awkwardly on the couch, asleep in a funny position, still wearing a fake Santa beard. A girl sits on the floor near a lit Christmas tree, surrounded by fallen ornaments, gift wrap, and empty cups, looking tired and detached.

The photo has noticeable film grain and digital noise, slight motion blur, uneven focus, and imperfect exposure typical of late-night smartphone selfies. Colors are warm and slightly yellow from indoor lighting, with blown highlights from the Christmas tree lights. The framing is messy and off-center, cutting off parts of the room, emphasizing the spontaneous, chaotic after-party vibe.
Style & Quality Cues
Smartphone selfie
Low resolution
Heavy film grain + digital noise
Wide-angle distortion
Slight blur and softness
JPEG compression artifacts
Mood & Vibe
Chaotic Christmas aftermath
Drunk, playful energy
Messy, unfiltered, candid
Humorous and relatable
Negative Prompt;

content:
"Use this photo attached to create a disposable camera–inspired candid portrait in the style of Petra Collins.

Hair (LOCKED – must remain identical every time):

As the reference photo 

Expression & Face:

Playful, slightly pouty candid expression. Eyes glance upward with a mildly bored, unserious, spontaneous look—not posed. Lips softly pursed. Natural skin texture visible, minimal makeup with soft blush and natural lip tone, no heavy retouching.

Pose & Framing:

Casual upper-body snapshot framing. Subject slightly off-center, shoulders relaxed, body angled subtly. Arms rest naturally close to the torso. Feels like a quick party photo taken mid-moment.

Attire & Accessories (high detail):

Wearing a simple fitted black spaghetti-strap top, casual and understated. Fabric reflects the flash subtly with slight sheen. No statement jewelry—focus remains on hair, expression, and accessories.

Sunglasses (DETAILED – {argument name="year" default="2026"}):

Oversized black plastic party sunglasses resting on top of the head. The lenses feature bold rhinestone-style numbers spelling “{argument name="year" default="2026"}”, evenly spaced across both lenses. The numbers sparkle harshly under direct flash, with uneven reflections, tiny blown highlights, and visible plastic texture. Sunglasses sit slightly crooked, reinforcing the candid, unpolished party feel.

Lighting & Camera:

Shot using a cheap 35mm disposable film camera. Direct on-camera flash only—harsh, flat, frontal lighting. Overexposed highlights on skin, hair, sunglasses, and balloons. Deep shadows behind the subject. Visible grain, slight blur, imperfect focus, no digital sharpness.

Background & Balloons (highly detailed):

Metallic foil fringe curtain in the background with silver and pastel reflections. Large metallic number balloons float nearby, partially cropped by the frame. Balloons show realistic seams, wrinkles, and creases, reflecting the flash with distorted highlights. Thin curling balloon strings hang unevenly, adding clutter and realism.

Color & Texture:

Slight film color cast, saturated but imperfect tones. Whites slightly blown, blacks mildly crushed. Strong grain throughout, soft edges, subtle color inconsistencies typical of disposable film.

Overall Mood:

Intimate, nostalgic, playful, and unfiltered—feels like a real late-night party snapshot taken by a friend, not a styled shoot.

Style Keywords:

Petra Collins inspired, disposable camera flash, candid party portrait, {argument name="year" default="2026"} sunglasses, metallic balloons, foil fringe backdrop, 35mm film grain, imperfect framing, nostalgic realism"

content:
Ultra-photorealistic single-frame photograph.
The person in ALL four frames must be 100% identical to the uploaded reference image. Preserve exact facial features: same face shape, same eyes, same nose structure, same lips, same skin texture. Zero deviation from reference. Do not generate a different person.
A single oversized photo-booth print strip dominates the composition, centered and filling 75-85% of the frame, held naturally by one hand with fingers partially visible for scale.
The strip contains exactly 4 frames arranged vertically (1 column × 4 rows). Each frame shows the SAME person from the reference image in New Year celebration moments:
- Frame 1: wearing a sparkly "{argument name="year crown" default="2026"}" crown, smiling
- Frame 2: blowing a party horn with confetti
- Frame 3: holding champagne glass, laughing
- Frame 4: making peace signs, excited expression
Background: shopping mall photo booth, distant and softly blurred with bokeh lights.
White border text at bottom reads exactly: "Happy New Year {argument name="year text" default="2026"}"
Photography style: Shot on Canon EOS R5, 50mm lens, f/2.8, natural mall lighting, sharp focus on the print strip.
STRICT RULES:
- No other people visible
- No logos, watermarks, or UI elements
- No numbers outside the print strip
- Person appears ONLY inside the printed photos
Face Consistency Lock: The facial structure, eye spacing, nose bridge, jawline, and all identifying features must match the reference with 100% accuracy across all 4 frames. @AdobeFirefly

content:
A cozy, cinematic winter scene inside a glass cable car in the Swiss Alps. A young man wearing a matte black puffer jacket over a neutral sweater and dark jeans sits on a wooden bench, looking calmly at the camera with a relaxed, confident expression. He has neatly styled dark hair and a natural, realistic look. The puffer jacket has realistic quilting, soft fabric sheen, and subtle creases, adding warmth and modern winter style.

On his left, {argument name="character 1" default="Nick Wilde from Zootopia"}, the sly red fox, leans in casually, wearing his signature green shirt and striped tie with a confident smirk. On his right, {argument name="character 2" default="Judy Hopps from Zootopia"}, the cheerful gray rabbit police officer in her blue uniform, sits close with an energetic, friendly expression. The man has one arm comfortably around each character, creating a wholesome, cinematic bonding moment.

Outside the cable car’s panoramic glass windows, vast snow-covered Alpine mountains stretch into the distance beneath a clear blue sky. A red alpine train crosses a stone bridge in the background, adding depth and story to the scene. Bright natural daylight, crisp winter air, ultra-detailed textures. Photorealistic human seamlessly blended with high-quality animated characters, accurate lighting interaction, soft natural shadows, sharp focus, cozy luxury travel aesthetic. 4:5 aspect ratio, high resolution.

description: A detailed prompt for generating a photorealistic image blending a human subject with animated characters (Nick Wilde and Judy Hopps from Zootopia) inside a glass cable car in the Swiss Alps. content:
{
  "prompt": "Use the uploaded image strictly as the identity and pose reference. Preserve the same person, facial structure, hairstyle, age, gender, body proportions, and overall likeness without adding or removing any person. Do not alter identity. Transform the subject into a hand-drawn storybook-style illustration created with colored pencils and soft watercolor washes.

Illustration Style:
Hand-drawn colored pencil illustration with clean, confident line art and slightly rough, organic pencil outlines. Pencil strokes should be clearly visible and layered, giving a natural hand-drawn feel. Combine this with gentle watercolor wash textures that softly blend colors without overpowering the pencil lines.

Color & Texture:
Use bright pastel colors with lighter, cheerful, and vivid tones while keeping natural saturation. Colors should feel soft and cozy, never harsh or neon. Apply flat yet detailed coloring with subtle watercolor gradients. Minimal shadows, soft highlights only, no dramatic lighting. No realism, no photo texture, no hyper-detail.

Facial Features & Expression:
Simplified, cute facial features in a semi-cartoon realistic proportion. Dot-style eyes, small gentle smiles, soft rounded face shapes. Expressions should feel warm, friendly, innocent, and approachable. Keep facial details minimal but expressive.

Mood & Atmosphere:
Warm, cozy, and cheerful atmosphere with a wholesome children’s book illustration feel. Friendly and comforting tone, suitable for a storybook or picture book. The overall mood should feel calm, joyful, and inviting.

Rendering Rules:
High clarity illustration, clean edges, no blur. No photographic realism, no cinematic lighting, no 3D render, no digital painting look. Avoid heavy shading, deep shadows, glossy skin, or realistic textures.

Background:
Simple, soft, illustrated background that complements the subject without distraction. Use pastel colors, gentle shapes, and minimal detail to maintain a storybook aesthetic.

Final Output:
A cozy, cheerful, hand-illustrated children’s book style artwork with colored pencil linework and soft watercolor textures, maintaining exact identity from the uploaded image while transforming it into a warm, friendly, semi-cartoon illustration.",
  "negative_prompt": "photorealism, hyper-realistic, realistic skin texture, photo texture, cinematic lighting, dramatic shadows, dark tones, neon colors, glossy skin, 3D render, oil painting, digital painting, anime style, manga style, vector art, pixel art, blur, noise, grain, extra people, face change, identity change, exaggerated realism",
  "quality": "high",
  "clarity": "very high",
  "style_strength": "strong illustration style",
  "reference_usage": "face and identity preservation required"
}

content:
Create a highly photorealistic, high-resolution full-body mirror selfie of a young woman in a modern indoor gym using the uploaded reference image with strict identity lock enabled. Her face must be 100% identical to the reference image with absolute preservation of identity. Do not alter facial structure, proportions, bone shape, skin texture, skin tone, eye shape, nose, lips, expression mechanics, age,or any fine facial details. No beauty retouching, no face refinement, no identity blending, and no stylization. The face must be an exact, unmodified match to the reference.
Her hair is {argument name="hair style" default="dark brown, styled in a long, wavy, messy bun with loose strands framing her face"}, appearing natural and realistic. Skin remains natural and realistic, matching the reference precisely.
Her expression is {argument name="expression" default="calm, composed, and slightly focused as she looks at the phone screen during the mirror selfie"}. Maintain a natural, candid demeanor without changing facial expression details.
She stands with one leg slightly forward, holding an orange iPhone smartphone in her right hand for the mirror selfie and a transparent water bottle filled with blue liquid in her left hand.

Outfit details:

Fitted short-sleeve white crop top

White long-sleeve shirt tied around her waist

High-waisted black athletic leggings
White crew socks
White athletic sneakers
Environment: a clean, modern gym featuring large wall mirrors with a visible vertical mirror seam in the frame, treadmills, weight machines, rubber gym flooring, and exercise mats. The background should be clear and realistic, with accurate scale and depth.
Lighting is bright overhead fluorescent gym lighting, providing even, neutral illumination with minimal shadows and no dramatic contrast.
Composition: a casual fitness lifestyle photograph, captured at eye level, with the subject centered in the frame. Emphasize sharp facial detail, realistic clothing textures, accurate reflections, and a clean, modern, casual mood. Apply minimal post-processing, no filters, no style transfer, and maintain strict facial identity lock at all times.

content:
Ultra photorealistic candid flash shot, intimate indoor night scene.
A young woman with fair skin and a soft, natural complexion is sitting very close to the camera at a kitchen table.
She has large light blue-green eyes, a slightly rounded face, a small straight nose, soft pink lips, and subtle natural makeup emphasizing her eyes.
Her expression is playful and slightly surprised, mouth open as she bites into a slice of pizza, eyes looking directly at the camera.
Her hair is light brown to dark blonde, styled casually with visible plastic hair rollers placed on the top and sides of her head, giving a relaxed at-home look.
She is wearing a loose white or light-colored robe or homewear with a soft fabric and relaxed neckline.
Small silver hoop earrings and a thin delicate chain necklace are visible.
She holds a slice of pizza in one hand and is actively biting into it.
The pizza slice has visible toppings including {argument name="pizza toppings" default="corn, pepperoni or salami, and vegetables"}.
In front of her on the table is an open cardboard pizza box, partially blocking the bottom of the frame.
With her other hand, she holds a glass jar or bottle containing a sauce or drink near the edge of the frame.
The setting is a modern kitchen at night with dark matte cabinets in the background.
A kettle and a few kitchen items are visible behind her.
The background feels real and lived-in, not styled or decorative.
Lighting is strong direct on-camera flash.
The flash creates bright highlights on her face and hard shadows on the cabinets behind her.
The image has a raw snapshot aesthetic, similar to early 2000s disposable camera photos.
There is slight film grain, imperfect framing, and a spontaneous candid feeling.
Camera distance is very close, slightly below eye level.
35mm lens look, handheld feeling.
No beauty retouching, no smoothing, natural skin texture with visible pores.
Ultra realistic, documentary-style lifestyle imagery.
nano banana pro realism, exact visual match.
title: Ultra Photorealistic Candid Flash Portrait of a Woman Eating Pizza
description: A detailed prompt for generating an ultra-photorealistic, candid portrait of a young woman eating pizza in an intimate indoor night scene, emphasizing a raw, early 2000s disposable camera aesthetic with harsh flash lighting and natural skin texture.

content: A dramatic, colorful Pop Art illustration of the subject in the uploaded image, styled with heavy black outlines, vibrant {argument name="color 1" default="blue"} and {argument name="color 2" default="magenta"} tones, and fully rendered in a uniform pattern of Ben-Day dots, capturing the moment as a single panel from a distressed 1960s romance comic book. The stark background is filled with yellow dots, contrasting with the intense, limited color palette applied to her white outfit, emphasizing the drama and tension.
title: Pop Art Comic Book Style Transfer
description: A prompt designed for style transfer, taking an uploaded image and rendering it as a dramatic, colorful Pop Art illustration in the style of a distressed 1960s romance comic book, utilizing Ben-Day dots and a limited, vibrant color palette.

title: Nightlife Flash Photography Portrait
description: A prompt for generating a raw, candid nightlife photograph using direct flash aesthetic. It details a female subject leaning against a worn yellow door with an abstract mural background, wearing a fitted t-shirt with text and high-waisted jeans. The technical specifications emphasize a wide 28mm lens, sharp shadows, and realistic skin texture with visible flash glare and grain.

title: Hard-Lock Lounge Pose Reconstruction Prompt
description: A highly technical JSON prompt using the 'PX-LOCK-EDITORIAL' engine to generate a photorealistic image with hard locks on pose, outfit, and environment. It describes a blonde woman in a sage green bodysuit lying on a carpeted floor with her eyes closed, specifying precise anatomical details and a relaxed, asymmetrical lounge posture.

title: Alpine Lake Bikini Portrait Prompt
description: An extremely detailed JSON prompt for Gemini Nano Banana Pro, focusing on generating an ultra-photorealistic travel lifestyle image of a young woman in a white bikini sitting on a granite boulder by a high-altitude alpine lake. The prompt meticulously defines the subject's appearance, pose, the majestic mountain environment, harsh high noon lighting, and specific camera settings (35mm lens, f/8, Kodak Portra 400 film emulation).

title: Ultra Photorealistic Alpine Lake Bikini Portrait
description: A highly detailed, structured prompt for generating an ultra-photorealistic image of a young woman in a white string bikini, sitting on a granite boulder by a high-altitude alpine lake, emphasizing harsh midday sunlight, detailed textures (skin pores, rock grain), and a Kodak Portra 400 film aesthetic.

description: A highly constrained prompt for generating a photorealistic, believable selfie encounter in a modern hotel lobby. The prompt specifies the pose and expression of the foreground subject (calm confidence) and the background subject, Roman Reigns, detailing his appearance and wardrobe, ensuring no fan-like excitement is shown.

content:
Create a 100% accurate portrait based on the attached reference file, without altering the face, in 8K resolution with a 3:4 aspect ratio (close-up focusing on the face). She has fair glowing skin and a model-like figure. Hair is long, thick, dark brown, middle-parted with Korean-style loose waves at the ends, with small strands framing her cheeks near the ears. Hair lightly blows across her face with a few wisps moving with the wind, cascading over her shoulders to frame her face slightly messy. Makeup is dewy and radiant, emphasizing luminous skin, long curled eyelashes, glossy pink blush, and soft glossy pink lips, reflecting light for a glowy effect. Outfit matches the one in the second attached image.

The scene is a seaside atmosphere inspired by Okinawa on a clear day. The background features turquoise-blue water sharply contrasting with the horizon, green low shrubs, and coastal trees. The ground is a brick-paved parking area with alternating faded gray and light brick squares, showing slight aging for realism. The sky is vivid blue with large white clouds, evoking summer. A modern {argument name="car model" default="red Volkswagen Beetle"} convertible with glossy finish and black leather interior is included, with the roof folded back. Natural daylight casts strong shadows on the car and ground for realistic depth.

Various poses are included: sitting in the driver’s seat, turning slightly back toward the camera, with one hand loosely on the steering wheel and the other adjusting sunglasses, looking at the camera with a stylish, alluring expression; stepping out of the car casually with one foot on the ground, holding the door and a bag, smiling naturally at the camera in a candid, approachable manner; sitting on the rear edge of the convertible, turning 45 degrees toward the camera with face lifted slightly toward the sunlight, one hand raised in a cheerful gesture, radiating bright and free vacation vibes; standing outside the car by the door or taillight, leaning hip against the car, crossing one leg forward to elongate the leg, one hand resting on the door and the other relaxed or holding a prop, looking casually toward the sea or slightly down with a dreamy, charming expression, in a fashion editorial style emphasizing outfit and car.

use the face from the attached image without any changes to facial features, preserve identity with nano-level precision and maintain all natural micro-expressions exactly as in the reference. create an ultra-photorealistic three-frame winter portrait sequence set in a snow-covered park

during the blue hour. in the first frame, depict the character sitting on a wooden bench, reading a book while snowflakes fall softly around them. render the environment with cinematic depth: frosted trees, distant lampposts glowing with diffused warm light, and a cold blue ambient atmosphere. in the second frame, capture a calm profile close-up with shallow depth of field, highlighting realistic snowflake interactions with hair, fabric, and air. in the third frame, show the character leaning back with eyes gently closed, immersed in the quiet winter evening, the coat, scarf, and all textile surfaces must show molecular-level texture detail, accurate lighting falloff, and true-to-physics shading. keep the background softly blurred with natural bokeh from lamplights, subtle haze, and crisp snowfall suspended in layered depth, ensure full photorealism with intelligent context awareness and precise atmospheric rendering.

content:
Initiate PersonaFusion-vX.03 protocol: Use the exact facial identity taken from the attached reference image (or from the user’s provided face) with zero alteration.  A hyper-realistic 1980s analog photograph capturing the celebratory optimism of a New Year's Eve studio portrait, imbued with a nostalgic, warm, and slightly formal mood, as if pulled from a family album. The image is rendered with the distinct characteristics of Kodak Gold 200 film stock, displaying warm, amber skin tones, slightly muted colors, and visible, organic film grain throughout. Illumination comes from a harsh, direct on-camera flash, creating a distinct bloom, sharp shadows, and a subtle red-eye effect. A smiling woman is confidently posed, seated with legs crossed on chunky, somewhat crudely gold-painted plywood numbers spelling out "{argument name="year" default="2026"}." She wears a shimmering royal blue stretch velvet cocktail dress, featuring pronounced shoulder pads that create a powerful, angular silhouette, a deep V-neckline, and full, gathered sleeves, cinched at the waist with a wide, self-fabric belt. Her makeup is subtly 80s chic, with a soft wash of frosted lavender eyeshadow across her lids, a precise sweep of rosy-peach blush applied high on the cheekbones, and lips defined by a coral rose lipstick with a satin finish. Her hair is a testament to 80s volume: heavily teased at the crown for maximum height, with feathered sides swept back and away from her face, and voluminous, side-swept bangs, all held in place with a visible hairspray sheen. The background is a textured studio backdrop, mottled in shades of deep teal and dusty rose, creating an abstract, dreamlike pattern, subtly lit from behind by the soft, yellow-orange glow of a "Happy New Year" neon sign.
The image is shot with a flash-lit camera, creating harsh lighting that illuminates the subject's skin. The overall aesthetic is that of a digital camera from the year 2000, with a distinct Y2K photo look. Slightly grainy, with off white thin border and a prominent cracks and fold depicting an authentic old photograph in the 1980's and a visible dust and scratches.
title: 1980s Analog New Year's Eve Portrait Prompt
description: A detailed prompt for generating a hyper-realistic 1980s analog photograph of a woman celebrating New Year's Eve 2026. It enforces zero alteration of the subject's facial identity (PersonaFusion-vX.03 protocol) and specifies the aesthetic details: Kodak Gold 200 film stock, harsh on-camera flash, a royal blue velvet cocktail dress with shoulder pads, 80s volume hair, and a Y2K photo look with visible film grain and cracks.

Shot on a professional camera, shallow depth of field, sharp focus on the subject’s face, background softly blurred. Editorial fashion portrait style, cinematic café photography, emotional, minimal, and artistic mood.

content:
{
  "prompt": "A young woman with long, straight {argument name="hair color" default="black"} hair styled in a center part, taking a mirror selfie while sitting on a bed. She is positioned with her legs bent and drawn up, knees slightly apart. Her right hand holds a black smartphone with a red cloud pattern case (Akatsuki from Naruto) up to her face, partially obscuring it, while her left index finger is gently pressed to her lips in a 'shh' gesture. She wears a white, strappy, low-cut mini dress with lace trim at the hem and delicate straps tied into bows over her shoulders. She has multiple visible tattoos: intricate designs on both forearms, a small one on her upper left chest near the collarbone, and another small tattoo on her right thigh. She wears subtle jewelry including small hoop earrings, a pearl choker necklace, and a thin bracelet. The background features a large, full-length mirror reflecting a bright window with sheer white curtains on the left, allowing soft natural light to fill the room. To the right, a white metal bed frame or headboard is visible, adorned with small potted plants and purple flowers. The bed she sits on is covered with a white duvet featuring a detailed black floral or botanical print. The lighting is bright, airy, and diffused, creating soft shadows and highlighting skin texture and fabric details. The image is sharply focused, high-resolution, capturing fine details like individual hair strands, the texture of the lace, and the clarity of the tattoos. The overall mood is intimate, serene, and slightly playful. The woman's face must remain exactly as uploaded — identical features, expression, and angle — only the hair color is changed to black.",

content:
Subject
A young woman kneeling in deep snow, captured in a profile view while taking a photograph. She is positioned in the center of the frame, leaning forward slightly to look through her camera's viewfinder.
Clothing
A thick, winter parka jacket in a color-block design featuring {argument name="parka colors" default="light pastel blue and white"} panels. She is wearing black winter trousers and thick, beige, knitted mittens/gloves.
Hair
Long, wavy, platinum blonde (almost white) hair that hangs loosely around her face and shoulders, blending slightly with the snowy aesthetic.
Face
Pale, natural complexion with a focused expression. Her face is partially obscured by the camera she is holding up to her eye.
Accessories
A professional black DSLR or mirrorless camera with a prominent zoom lens held in her hands. A mustard-yellow canvas backpack is strapped to her back, providing a colorful contrast to the cool tones.
Environment
A serene winter forest setting. The background is filled with tall pine trees heavily laden with fresh white snow. The ground is covered in a thick, soft layer of undisturbed snow.
Lighting
Soft, diffused, overcast natural light typical of a winter day. The lighting is even with no harsh shadows, creating a cool, calm atmospheric tone.
Camera
Medium shot, eye-level angle. Shallow depth of field (bokeh) used to keep the subject sharp while softly blurring the snowy trees in the background. High-resolution photography style.
Style
Photorealistic, cinematic winter lifestyle photography, nature portrait, serene and cold aesthetic, 8k resolution, highly detailed.
title: Serene Winter Photography Portrait
description: A detailed prompt for generating a photorealistic, cinematic winter lifestyle portrait of a woman kneeling in deep snow in a forest, taking a photograph, emphasizing cool, diffused lighting and a shallow depth of field.

content:
A black-and-white portrait.
Cinematic style with added grain. The image shows an extreme close-up of half of the girl’s face. She looks directly at the camera, with her skin illuminated. She poses like a model, with her hand raised, elbow resting on her cheek, the hand in a graceful pose. The background is dark.
Only her long hair is visible, partially obscuring her face.

content: Meal, Ready-to-Eat. What's inside?🙃
title: MRE Package Design Prompt (Short)
description: A simple prompt for generating a package design image in the style of a Meal, Ready-to-Eat (MRE) ration, asking what contents are inside.

content:
The world is a huge makeshift stage,

and also a huge Palace of Versailles.

Every day we are in magnificent office buildings,

playing the elite, speaking jargon,
even if deep down we feel like just a sour pickle,
or a soda can repeatedly squeezed by life.
The more glamorous the appearance,
 the more we want to go crazy inside.
Forget it,
I'll seal the packaging now,
and continue to play the emotionally stable adult.
title: Corporate Elite Self-Reflection Portrait Prompt
description: This is a narrative-driven prompt for Nano Banana Pro, focusing on generating a portrait that captures the internal conflict of a modern professional. The prompt uses rich metaphorical language—comparing the subject to a 'sour pickle' or 'crushed soda can'—to contrast their polished, elite exterior (gold-plated office, black-speak) with their inner turmoil, aiming for a visual representation of emotional stability masking madness.
